description: Procurement of office furniture and installation for Intelligent Marine Systems (ISMI) at Bedford Institute of Oceanography (BIO) in Nova Scotia.
full_summary:
# **Tender Announcement**

## **Title**
EB129-231516 - Office Furniture for the Bedford Institute of Oceanography (BIO) Facility for Intelligent Marine Systems (FIMS)

## **Reference Number**
WS3912325231 - Doc3912394264

## **Notice Type**
Request for Proposal

## **Procurement Method**
Competitive - Selective tendering

## **Selection Criteria**
Lowest Price

## **Description**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) to secure a supplier to provide office furniture for the BIO FIMS facility. The procurement is divided into multiple product categories, including interconnecting panels and freestanding systems, metal filing and storage cabinets, and ancillary and lighting products.

## **Required Products**
- Product Category 1: Interconnecting panels and freestanding systems
- Product Category 2: Freestanding height adjustable desk/table products
- Product Category 3: Metal filing and storage cabinets
- Product Category 5: Ancillary and lighting products
- Product Category 6: Collaborative furniture

## **Location**
The required products will be delivered and installed at the BIO FIMS facility in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, Atlantic Region, by August 16th, 2023.

## **Trade Agreements**
This procurement is open to bidders who are compliant with the following trade agreements:
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## **Contact Information**
For more information about the procurement process or to become a pre-qualified SA holder, please contact:
- Bronwen Grieve (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [bronwen.grieve@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bronwen.grieve@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
